title: Liam Gallagher's love child Molly Moorish changes her name
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Liam Gallagher's love child Molly Moorish has changed her name on social media to include her father's surname.

The dad, 47, and daughter, 21, were estranged for nearly two decades but Molly and Liam met for the first time last year.

The model is now a part of his family and edited her Instagram handle from mollymoorish to mollymoorishgallagher on Friday to prove how close they are.

She also shared a snap of herself and he dad donning Gucci bucket hats .

Liam sported a white towel dressing gown and threw up a rude gesture with his finger to the camera lens whilst Molly cuddled up to her rocker dad.

She captioned the family snap: "It’s all Gucci."

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Until 2018, Liam kept his distance from his first born and her mum Lisa Moorish, who he had an affair with after his wedding to actress Patsy Kensit.

He is also dad to Lennon, 19, with Patsy and 17-year-old Gene with All Saints star Nicole Appleton.

Liam is yet to meet his fourth child, six-year-old Gemma - daughter of writer Liza Ghorbani.

(Image: LisaMoorishGallagher/Instagram)

(Image: LisaMoorishGallagher/Instagram)

He previously opened up about his relationship with Molly, telling The Sunday Times Magazine how they make things work.

The singer explained: "There were tears and all that. Me and Molly met in a pub. Then we got really drunk and that was really good.

“You can’t live in the past, you just have to draw the line and get stuck in with some super love going forward.

(Image: Getty Images)

“I hope she doesn’t get sick of me, you know what I mean?

"I wouldn’t say I’m a normal dad, I am more of their mate.”

description: The daughter of Oasis' Liam Gallagher has changed her name on Instagram
